Name: Celestial v1.02
Description:
REQUIRES CD2 beta 15 (UPDATED), MEV v5.4 AND DEA a05t2+. Recommended VEA. Celestial, shortened as CS, is a spin off of ND and the dial-down version of Interstellar with some interesting twists on modded enemies.
    v1.02: 
  - Glyphid Rat: Fix incorrect number value on OnFireHeatRange (0.2cm -> 0.2m).
  - Swarmer: MinSpawnCount is now 1, MaxSpawnCount 80 -> 100. HealthRaw 5 -> 4 (Fix Drak and Client pickaxe breakpoint a bit more). 
  - Fix typo on CustomVeteran Praetorian ED (doesn't matter much).
